metadata.description:
# NFT Music for Creators | Ambient Relax Meditation | [EDITION 1/10] 

Only 10 copies of each track will be available!!!

You will get:

- 2 FILES: WAV 44,1 KHz 16 Bit + mp3 320 kbps (unlocked download)

- After a successful transaction, you will be able to request (via alexandermgreat@gmail.com) the commercial license text (issued in your name).

COMMERCIAL LICENSE (NFT)

✔ You can create as many NFT projects as desired (based on this track).

✔ You can resell this NFT as it is (a standard "resell" option).

✔ You can sell your NFT project (based on this track) limitless on any chosen NFT market.

✔ You can cut, edit, loop, extend, add a voice to the track.

COMMERCIAL LICENSE (MEDIA)

✔ You are allowed to use the track in all possible social media, on your website, on the radio, or on TV. Mostly everywhere.

✔ Use it as background music for commercial courses, tutorials, web promos, real-estate, presentations, audiobooks, etc.

✔ You can cut, edit, loop, extend, add a voice to the track.

✔ Based on the licensed track, you can create as many projects as desired.

ATTENTION: This track is copyrighted and legally protected (DMCA Force/HAAWK). Any illegal distributing and copying outside the license conditions will be in violation of Applicable Law.

Thank you for using my music. You are literally making my dreams come true.

Alexander MGreat & BlueTreeAudio.com
